OrgName.entry: ST PAULS CHURCH AND CENTRE, NORTON LEES

Desc.entry: Anglican church. Provides facilities and rooms for hire for community groups, social events and business meetings (see separate entry).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 8am (Holy Communion) & 10am (Worship), 3rd Sun in the month (Family Worship), Tues at 10am (Holy Communion); Mon 6-7pm (Rainbows), Mon 7-8pm (Belrobics, belly dancing class), Tues 6.15-9pm (Brownies and Guides), One Tues in the month at 7.30pm (Norton Lees Local History Group, see separate entry), Wed 10am-2pm (Peekaboo parent and toddler group), 2nd Wed in the month 2-4pm (Mothers' Union), Wed 6-7.30pm (yoga for all), Fortnightly on Wed at 7.30pm (Women's Institute), Wed at 8pm (tai chi), Thurs at 10am & 6.30pm (Weight Watchers), 2nd & 4th Thurs in the month 7-9pm (St Paul's music listening group), alternate Fri 7.30-9.30pm (Worship group)
